unit.fullMarkdown:
# UNIT 2.2: OPENING PROCEDURES — PRACTICE

**Duration:** 4-6 hours (2-3 opening shifts)  
**Trainer:** Demetri (observing)

## Structure

### Shift 1: Shadow an Experienced Opener
- Observe everything, ask questions, take notes
- Don't do tasks—watch and learn
- Focus: sequence, timing, techniques

### Shift 2: Execute with Supervision
- Heming does the work with trainer present
- Can ask questions as needed
- Uses checklist actively

### Shift 3: Execute with Minimal Guidance
- Heming opens independently
- Demetri arrives at 10:45 AM to inspect
- Completes closer rating
- Ready to open doors on time

## Evaluation Criteria
- [ ] All checklist items completed
- [ ] Doors open on time
- [ ] Restaurant is guest-ready
- [ ] Rating of previous closer is fair and specific
